eating trends for Thanksgiving Day 2024, a proposed change to weight-loss
medicine coverage, and much more. First time reading? Join over 4

<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9qb2luMTQ0MC5jb=

*Editor's note: The 1440 staff will be off for Thanksgiving. We'll see you
Saturday=E2=80=94have a great holiday!*
Need To Know
Need To Know


Thanksgiving Logistics

A record 80 million Americans
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9uZXdzcm9vbS5hY=
WEuY29tLzIwMjQvMTEvbmVhcmx5LTgwLW1pbGxpb24tYW1lcmljYW5zLWV4cGVjdGVkLXRvLXRy=
YXZlbC1vdmVyLXRoYW5rc2dpdmluZy8/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B5f44edb6>
will
travel 50 miles or more over Thanksgiving weekend, the majority (a record
71.7 million) by car. Millions more are expected to fly
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudHNhLmdvd=
i9uZXdzL3ByZXNzL3JlbGVhc2VzLzIwMjQvMTEvMTkvdHNhLXJlYWRpZXMtYnVzaWVzdC10aGFu=
a3NnaXZpbmctdHJhdmVsLXBlcmlvZC1yZWNvcmQtcHJvdmlkZXM/67456a0c2f068d0b710a839=
7Bd7550a07>,
including a record-breaking 3 million on Sunday alone.



Over 80% of Americans will eat turkey (watch overview
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueW91dHViZ=
S5jb20vd2F0Y2g_dj1XVm9YNW9UcnN0UQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B31e1c5f9>),
requiring an estimated 46 million birds to supply the feast. A recent
survey suggests mashed potatoes, bread rolls, and pie will be standard
fare; macaroni and cheese consumption is highly regionalized (see map
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubmV3c3dlZ=
WsuY29tL3RoYW5rc2dpdmluZy1kaW5uZXItcG9sbC1tb3N0LWxlYXN0LXBvcHVsYXItZm9vZHMt=
MTk5MTA4MA/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B0b46e46a>).
A holiday meal for 10 will cost $58 on average, down 5% from last year and
the lowest inflation-adjusted cost in the 39 years of the farmers' survey (=
see
charts
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmIub3JnL=
21hcmtldC1pbnRlbC90aGFua3NnaXZpbmctZGlubmVyLWNvc3RzLWFyZS1kb3duLWFnYWlu/674=
56a0c2f068d0b710a8397B6f6cb461>
).



Meteorologists are predicting a relatively wet, chilly
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudXNhdG9kY=
XkuY29tL3N0b3J5L25ld3MvbmF0aW9uLzIwMjQvMTEvMjYvdGhhbmtzZ2l2aW5nLXdlYXRoZXIt=
Zm9yZWNhc3QtbGl2ZS11cGRhdGVzLXNub3ctdHJhdmVsLzc2NTg1NTI5MDA3Lw/67456a0c2f06=
8d0b710a8397Bb6a25f99>
Thanksgiving for half the country, with snow in the Midwest and rain on the
East Coast. A cold front will impact close to 200 million Americans by
Saturday. The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade will take place rain or shine
tomorrow in New York City (8:30 am ET, NBC).


Proposed Obesity Coverage

The Biden administration introduced a proposal
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb=
20vMjAyNC8xMS8yNi9iaWRlbi1wcm9wb3Nlcy1tZWRpY2FyZS1hbmQtbWVkaWNhaWQtY292ZXIt=
d2VpZ2h0LWxvc3MtZHJ1Z3MuaHRtbA/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B4d2c8207>
yesterday to expand Medicare and Medicaid coverage to include popular
weight-loss medications like Wegovy and Zepbound. The initiative, led by
the Department of Health and Human Services, would classify obesity as a
treatable disease to reduce associated health risks including heart disease
and diabetes.



Roughly 40% of Americans
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2JzbmV3c=
y5jb20vbmV3cy9vYmVzaXR5LXJhdGUtdXMtYWR1bHRzLWNkYy1kYXRhLW1hcC8/67456a0c2f06=
8d0b710a8397B53b9b0f4>
are considered clinically obese. Weight-loss drugs can reduce weight by as
much as 15% to 25% by regulating appetite
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9tY2IuaWxsaW5va=
XMuZWR1L25ld3MvMjAyNC0wNy0wOS9ob3ctZG8tZHJ1Z3Mtb3plbXBpYy13b3JrLXdlaWdodC1s=
b3Nz/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B8bb08362>,
signaling to the brain that the body is full, and reducing hunger. The
proposed rule could reduce out-of-pocket costs for the drug=E2=80=94which c=
an
exceed $1,000 per month=E2=80=94by up to 95% for over 7.4 million Medicare =
and
Medicaid beneficiaries. The estimated cost to taxpayers is $35B over the
next decade.



The rule would not be finalized until after President-elect Donald Trump
takes office; his HHS pick, Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudXNhdG9kY=
XkuY29tL3N0b3J5L2xpZmUvaGVhbHRoLXdlbGxuZXNzLzIwMjQvMTEvMjYvYmlkZW4tcmZrLWpy=
LW96ZW1waWMtd2Vnb3Z5LXdlaWdodC1sb3NzLW1lZGljYXRpb24vNzY1ODc0NTYwMDcv/67456a=
0c2f068d0b710a8397B695e08ae>,
has criticized the drugmakers, instead seeking to prioritize access to
healthy nutrition.


Tit-for-Tat Tariffs

Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum threatened retaliatory tariffs
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9hcG5ld3MuY29tL=
2FydGljbGUvbWV4aWNvLXRhcmlmZnMtdHJ1bXAtcmV0YWxpYXRlLXNoZWluYmF1bS1mYWMwYjBj=
NmVlOGM0MjVhOTI4NDE4ZGU3MzMyYjc0YQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bb90c575e>
on US goods yesterday, in response to President-elect Donald Trump's
pledged 25% tariffs if Mexico fails to halt the flow of drugs and migrants
into the US. Trump also indicated he would impose a 25% tariff on goods
from Canada and an additional 10% tariff on goods from China.



The US is the world's largest importer, with Mexico topping its list of
trading partners, followed by Canada and China (see list here
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2Vuc3VzL=
mdvdi9mb3JlaWduLXRyYWRlL3N0YXRpc3RpY3MvaGlnaGxpZ2h0cy90b3B5ci5odG1s/67456a0=
c2f068d0b710a8397B0e01e14b>).
The three North American countries exchanged $1.8T worth of goods in 2022;
annual US trade with China is $600B. The US is Mexico's top importer, with
cars, food, and beer among the goods most likely to be impacted by tariffs.
Canada supplied 60% of the US' crude oil, among other goods.



The announcement shook up global markets yesterday, with automakers' stocks
especially hard hit. Canadian and Mexican currencies fell against the value
of the dollar.

<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9idXRjaGVyYm94L=

.

Science & Technology

*>* *Chipmaker Intel awarded* close to $7.9B to support building and
expansion of semiconductor manufacturing facilities in Arizona, New Mexico,
Oregon, and Ohio; funds come from the 2022 CHIPS Act (More
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudGhldmVyZ=
2UuY29tLzIwMjQvMTEvMjYvMjQzMDYzNDgvaW50ZWwtYXdhcmRlZC04LWJpbGxpb24tY2hpcHMt=

9ZW1haWwmdXRtX3BsYWNlbWVudD1uZXdzbGV0dGVy/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B39d91c92=

)

*>* *Scientists transplant *pig heart valve into a rodent with the
assistance of human skin cells reprogrammed into heart valve cells; the
procedure paves the way for similar organ transplants to humans, with
roughly 30,000 Americans dying each year from aortic heart valve failure (
More
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9uZXdzLm5vcnRoZ=

*In partnership with NativePath*
*Your Most Abundant Protein*
*Your Most Abundant Protein*

Did you know the body produces 1%-2% less collagen per year, starting in
your 30s? As *the most abundant protein in the body*
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9mYi5uYXRpdmVwY=
XRoLmNvbS9yZC9yLnBocD9zaWQ9MTcyMiZwdWI9MjQwNjk1JmMxPTIwMjQxMTI3LVJFTVNFQ09O=
REFSWS1lc3QxNzUwMCZjMj0mYzM9/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B6df290bb>,
this contributes to wrinkles, joint pain, and dwindling bones.



Luckily, you can now *slow the process with NativePath Collagen Protein*
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9mYi5uYXRpdmVwY=
XRoLmNvbS9yZC9yLnBocD9zaWQ9MTcyMiZwdWI9MjQwNjk1JmMxPTIwMjQxMTI3LVJFTVNFQ09O=
REFSWS1lc3QxNzUwMCZjMj0mYzM9/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397C6df290bb>.
In 1 study, 5g of collagen/day caused a 7% increase in bone density in 1
year! Simply add 2 flavorless NativePath scoops to coffee or your favorite
drink for *18g of protein*
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9mYi5uYXRpdmVwY=
XRoLmNvbS9yZC9yLnBocD9zaWQ9MTcyMiZwdWI9MjQwNjk1JmMxPTIwMjQxMTI3LVJFTVNFQ09O=
REFSWS1lc3QxNzUwMCZjMj0mYzM9/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397D6df290bb>
!

*In partnership with ButcherBox*

Ribeye, Filet Mignon, and NY Strip=E2=80=94Oh My

best cuts of steak, *read closely*. ButcherBox, the service that curates
high-quality meats and *delivers them straight to your door*
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9idXRjaGVyYm94L=
nB4Zi5pby9jLzEyNjAwMTkvMjE3MzAyMi8xNjQxOQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Ib61ef777=
>,
is running one of their best deals of the year.



Along with their other *preservative- and antibiotic-free meats in every
box*
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9idXRjaGVyYm94L=
nB4Zi5pby9jLzEyNjAwMTkvMjE3MzAyMi8xNjQxOQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Jb61ef777=
>,
new customers who sign up in the next 48 hours will also get f*ree steak in
every box for a year* (a $336+ value!). Choose between ribeye, filet
mignon, and NY strip, *PLUS get $100 off ($20 off your first five boxes)
with code 1440NOVEMBER.*
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9idXRjaGVyYm94L=

*Historybook:* The Nobel Prize is established (1895); Bruce Lee born
(1940); Jimi Hendrix born (1942); Mars 2, a Soviet space probe, is first
human-made object to reach Mars (1971); LGBTQ+ rights activist Harvey Milk
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9lbi53aWtpcGVka=
WEub3JnL3dpa2kvSGFydmV5X01pbGs/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B39f5ccb7>
is
assassinated (1978).

"It takes no money to respect the individual."

- Harvey Milk

*Why 1440? *The printing press was invented around the year 1440, spreading
knowledge to the masses and changing the course of history. More facts: In
every day, there are 1,440 minutes. We=E2=80=99re here to make each one cou=
nt.



*Send us your feedback at* hello@join1440.com and help us stay as unbiased
as humanly possible. We=E2=80=99re ready to listen.

a 1440 partner, apply here
<https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9qb2luMTQ0MC5jb=
20vcGFydG5lcg/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B7949f1a2>
.

otives.</div><div><span><img src=3D"https://link.join1440.com/img/67456a0c2=

<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-top:12px;padding-right:20px;padding-bot=
tom:10px;padding-left:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Roboto,&quot;Helvetic=
a Neue&quot;,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:15px;color:rgb(0,0,0);fon=
t-weight:normal;line-height:22px;letter-spacing:normal;text-align:left"><p =
style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;=
padding:0"><span>A record <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/376336=
51.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly9uZXdzcm9vbS5hYWEuY29tLzIwMjQvMTEvbmVhcmx5LTgwLW1pbGxp=
b24tYW1lcmljYW5zLWV4cGVjdGVkLXRvLXRyYXZlbC1vdmVyLXRoYW5rc2dpdmluZy8/67456a0=
c2f068d0b710a8397B5f44edb6" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;co=
lor:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,=
238)">80 million Americans</font></a>=C2=A0will travel 50 miles or more ove=
r Thanksgiving weekend, the majority (a record 71.7 million) by car. Millio=
ns more are <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR=
0cHM6Ly93d3cudHNhLmdvdi9uZXdzL3ByZXNzL3JlbGVhc2VzLzIwMjQvMTEvMTkvdHNhLXJlYW=
RpZXMtYnVzaWVzdC10aGFua3NnaXZpbmctdHJhdmVsLXBlcmlvZC1yZWNvcmQtcHJvdmlkZXM/6=
7456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bd7550a07" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!import=
ant;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rg=
b(0,0,238)">expected to fly</font></a>, including a record-breaking 3 milli=
on on Sunday alone.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>Over 80% of Americans will eat turkey (<a href=3D"https=
://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueW91dHViZS5jb20=
vd2F0Y2g_dj1XVm9YNW9UcnN0UQ/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B31e1c5f9" style=3D"tex=
t-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_b=
lank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">watch overview</font></a>), requir=
ing an estimated 46 million birds to supply the feast. A recent survey sugg=
ests mashed potatoes, bread rolls, and pie will be standard fare; macaroni =
and cheese consumption is highly regionalized (<a href=3D"https://link.join=
1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubmV3c3dlZWsuY29tL3RoYW5rc2d=
pdmluZy1kaW5uZXItcG9sbC1tb3N0LWxlYXN0LXBvcHVsYXItZm9vZHMtMTk5MTA4MA/67456a0=
c2f068d0b710a8397B0b46e46a" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;co=
lor:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,=
238)">see map</font></a>). A holiday meal for 10 will cost $58 on average, =
down 5% from last year and the lowest inflation-adjusted cost in the 39 yea=
rs of the farmers&#39; survey (<a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/3=
7633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZmIub3JnL21hcmtldC1pbnRlbC90aGFua3NnaXZpbmc=
tZGlubmVyLWNvc3RzLWFyZS1kb3duLWFnYWlu/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B6f6cb461" st=
yle=3D"text-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" ta=
rget=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">see charts</font></a>).<=
/span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"padding:0;margin:0"><span>Meteorologists are predicting a relat=
ively <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6L=
y93d3cudXNhdG9kYXkuY29tL3N0b3J5L25ld3MvbmF0aW9uLzIwMjQvMTEvMjYvdGhhbmtzZ2l2=
aW5nLXdlYXRoZXItZm9yZWNhc3QtbGl2ZS11cGRhdGVzLXNub3ctdHJhdmVsLzc2NTg1NTI5MDA=
3Lw/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397Bb6a25f99" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!i=
mportant;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"col=
or:rgb(0,0,238)">wet, chilly</font></a> Thanksgiving for half the country, =
with snow in the Midwest and rain on the East Coast. A cold front will impa=
ct close to 200 million Americans by Saturday. The Macy&#39;s Thanksgiving =
Day Parade will take place rain or shine tomorrow in New York City (8:30 am=
 ET, NBC). =C2=A0</span></p></div>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td style=3D"padding:20px">
<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"100%" styl=

</td>

<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-right:20px;padding-bottom:5px;padding-l=
eft:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Georgia,Times,&quot;Times New Roman&quo=
t;,serif;font-size:23px;color:rgb(0,0,0);font-weight:normal;line-height:32p=
x;letter-spacing:normal;text-align:left"><p style=3D"padding:0;margin:0">Pr=
oposed Obesity Coverage</p></div>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" border=3D"0" width=3D"100%">
<tbody><tr>
<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-top:12px;padding-right:20px;padding-bot=
tom:10px;padding-left:20px"><div style=3D"font-family:Roboto,&quot;Helvetic=
a Neue&quot;,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:15px;color:rgb(0,0,0);fon=
t-weight:normal;line-height:22px;letter-spacing:normal;text-align:left"><p =
style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;=
padding:0"><span>The Biden administration introduced <a href=3D"https://lin=
k.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY25iYy5jb20vMjAyNC8xM=
S8yNi9iaWRlbi1wcm9wb3Nlcy1tZWRpY2FyZS1hbmQtbWVkaWNhaWQtY292ZXItd2VpZ2h0LWxv=
c3MtZHJ1Z3MuaHRtbA/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B4d2c8207" style=3D"text-decorat=
ion:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><fo=
nt style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">a proposal</font></a> yesterday to expand M=
edicare and Medicaid coverage to include popular weight-loss medications li=
ke Wegovy and Zepbound. The initiative, led by the Department of Health and=
 Human Services, would classify obesity as a treatable disease to reduce as=
sociated health risks=C2=A0including heart disease and diabetes.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>Roughly <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/3763=
3651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2JzbmV3cy5jb20vbmV3cy9vYmVzaXR5LXJhdGUtdXMtYW=
R1bHRzLWNkYy1kYXRhLW1hcC8/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B53b9b0f4" style=3D"text-=
decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_bla=
nk"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">40% of Americans</font></a> are cons=
idered clinically obese. Weight-loss drugs can reduce weight by as much as =
15% to 25% by <a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/a=
HR0cHM6Ly9tY2IuaWxsaW5vaXMuZWR1L25ld3MvMjAyNC0wNy0wOS9ob3ctZG8tZHJ1Z3Mtb3pl=
bXBpYy13b3JrLXdlaWdodC1sb3Nz/67456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B8bb08362" style=3D"te=
xt-decoration:underline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_=
blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">regulating appetite</font></a>, s=
ignaling to the brain that the body is full, and reducing hunger. The propo=
sed rule could reduce out-of-pocket costs for the drug=E2=80=94which can ex=
ceed $1,000 per month=E2=80=94by up to 95% for over 7.4 million Medicare an=
d Medicaid beneficiaries. The estimated cost to taxpayers is $35B over the =
next decade.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"padding:0;margin:0"><span>The rule would not be finalized until=
 after President-elect Donald Trump takes office; his HHS pick,=C2=A0<a hre=
f=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cudXNhd=
G9kYXkuY29tL3N0b3J5L2xpZmUvaGVhbHRoLXdlbGxuZXNzLzIwMjQvMTEvMjYvYmlkZW4tcmZr=
LWpyLW96ZW1waWMtd2Vnb3Z5LXdlaWdodC1sb3NzLW1lZGljYXRpb24vNzY1ODc0NTYwMDcv/67=
456a0c2f068d0b710a8397B695e08ae" style=3D"text-decoration:underline!importa=
nt;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb=
(0,0,238)">Robert F. Kennedy Jr.</font></a>, has criticized the drugmakers,=
 instead seeking to prioritize access to healthy nutrition.</span></p></div=
>
</td>

padding:0"><span>Mexican President=C2=A0Claudia Sheinbaum threatened <a hre=

arget=3D"_blank"><font style=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">retaliatory tariffs</fo=
nt></a> on US goods yesterday, in response to President-elect Donald Trump&=
#39;s pledged 25% tariffs if Mexico fails to halt the flow of drugs and mig=
rants into the US. Trump also indicated he would impose a 25% tariff on goo=
ds from Canada and an additional 10%=C2=A0tariff on goods from China.=C2=A0=
</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>The US is the world&#39;s largest importer, with Mexico=
 topping its list of trading partners, followed by Canada and China (see li=
st=C2=A0<a href=3D"https://link.join1440.com/click/37633651.4673008/aHR0cHM=

rline!important;color:rgb(0,0,238)!important" target=3D"_blank"><font style=
=3D"color:rgb(0,0,238)">here</font></a>). The three North American countrie=
s exchanged $1.8T worth of goods in 2022; annual US trade with China is $60=
0B.=C2=A0The US is Mexico&#39;s top importer, with cars, food, and beer amo=
ng the goods most likely to be impacted by tariffs. Canada supplied 60% of =
the US&#39; crude oil, among other goods.</span></p>
<p style=3D"margin-left:0px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0=
px;padding:0"><span>=C2=A0</span></p>
<p style=3D"padding:0;margin:0"><span>The announcement shook up global mark=
ets yesterday, with automakers&#39; stocks especially hard hit. Canadian an=
d Mexican currencies fell against the value of the dollar.=C2=A0</span></p>=
</div>

</tbody></table>
</td>
</tr>

lor=3D"#ffffff" style=3D"background-color:rgb(255,255,255)">
<tbody><tr>
<td valign=3D"top" style=3D"padding-right:20px;padding-left:20px">

padding:0"><span><span style=3D"font-size:12px"><strong>Why 1440? </strong>=
The printing press was invented around the year 1440, spreading knowledge t=
o the masses and changing the course of history. More facts: In every day, =
there are=C2=A01,440 minutes. We=E2=80=99re here to make each one count.</s=
pan></span></p>

l rights reserved.</span></p></div>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
